alert.note: Alert for Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 12:34PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Fremont County and extreme southern Hot Springs County through 115 PM MDT... At 1230 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Boysen State Park, and Shoshoni, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. Hail may briefly cover the ground with this storm. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor plants and gardens is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Shoshoni around 1240 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Brief heavy rain is also occurring with this storm.

area.areaDesc: Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Wind River Basin
